summary:
### December 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/grants.buidlguidl.com

- **Bug Fixes**: 
  - Merged Pull Request #154 addressed security vulnerabilities (CVE-2025-55184 and CVE-2025-55183), enhancing the repository's security.

- **Issues Management**:
  - One issue (#152) was closed after updating a builder address from a compromised wallet, ensuring funds are directed to a secure wallet.
  - One issue (#153) remains open, indicating ongoing concerns regarding another compromised builder.

- **Overall Themes**:
  - Focus on security and integrity of grant management by addressing compromised wallets.
  - Minimal activity with only one merged PR and two issues, one of which is still pending resolution.

topIssues.title: Update builder address from compromised builder (smartdevx.eth)
Update builder address from compromised builder (dmystical-coder.eth)
